coercion and checking functions for dfm objects

Check for a dfm, or convert a matrix into a dfm.

is.dfm(x)

as.dfm(x)

Arguments

x

a dfm object

Value

is.dfm returns TRUE if and only if its argument is a dfm. as.dfm coerces a matrix or data.frame to a dfm

See also

as.data.frame.dfm, as.matrix.dfm

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • See also
